title: The following is a content layout
text: Each section below has a message and graphics exactly like https://one.ai/.  You're okaying these before fleshing them out more.  Edit anything.  They are interchangeable.

title: 1. We express the problem here.
text: Describe energy grid challenges now and in the future.  Graphics too.

title: 2. Describe our solution
text: How we provide resources for scientists and organizations to develop energy solutions.  Graphics too.

title: 3. How your participation is key
text: You can immediately join and get the benefits listed.

title: 4. The benefits of our solution
text: How OPEN supports any country's endeavor to develop a sustainable energy grid.

title: 5. Supporting our assertions above
text: How OPEN does the things we are promising above.  Graphics too.

text: Shows the impact your involvement with OPEN will have.

text: Everything that is here in the site available to you now.
